title: All-Inclusive Maldives Resort & Spa on Private Island with Five Restaurants, Three Bars & Onsite Spa
description:
Leave the world behind in the secluded Lhaviyani Atoll, where white sand meets turquoise waters and palm trees sway. Just a short seaplane ride from Mal√©, this all-inclusive Maldivian resort offers luxurious all-villa accommodation surrounded by the Indian Ocean.

Spend your days snorkelling underwater wonderlands, unwind on soft sandy beaches, and indulge in eight diverse dining experiences-from Sri Lankan street food to flame-grilled Japanese teppanyaki to tropical cocktails from the pool bar. Or perhaps, slow down at the onsite Akiri Spa with a tranquil treatment crafted by a skilled therapist. Your stay promises to be as relaxing or adventurous as you choose.
